mapper.insert: insert into audio_upload (id, question_id, duration, name, url, subject, status, approve_time, teacher_id, create_time, update_time, type, source,feud_type,wb_type) values (#{id}, #{questionId}, #{duration}, #{name}, #{url}, #{subject}, #{status}, #{approveTime}, #{teacherId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{type}, #{source},#{feudType},#{wbType})
mapper.update: update audio_upload set question_id = #{questionId}, duration = #{duration}, name = #{name}, url = #{url}, subject = #{subject}, status = #{status}, approve_time = #{approveTime}, teacher_id = #{teacherId}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, type = #{type}, source = #{source}, feud_type = #{feudType}, wb_type = #{wbType} where id = #{id}
